Type.Name: EventType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EventType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of the event.
Docs.remarks: Do not confuse these events with the signals that GTK+ widgets emit. Although many of these events result in corresponding signals being emitted, the events are often transformed or filtered along the way.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType ButtonPress = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A mouse button has been pressed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType ButtonRelease = int32(7)

Docs.summary: A mouse button has been released.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType ClientEvent = int32(28)

Docs.summary: A message has been received from another application.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType Configure = int32(13)

Docs.summary: The size, position or stacking order of the window has changed. Note that GTK+ discards these events for Gdk.WindowType.Child windows.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType Damage = int32(36)

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType Delete = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The window manager has requested that the toplevel window be hidden or destroyed, usually when the user clicks on a special icon in the title bar.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType Destroy = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The window has been destroyed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType DragEnter = int32(22)

Docs.summary: The mouse has entered the window while a drag is in progress.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType DragLeave = int32(23)

Docs.summary: The mouse has left the window while a drag is in progress.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType DragMotion = int32(24)

Docs.summary: The mouse has moved in the window while a drag is in progress.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType DragStatus = int32(25)

Docs.summary: The status of the drag operation initiated by the window has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType DropFinished = int32(27)

Docs.summary: The drop operation initiated by the window has completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType DropStart = int32(26)

Docs.summary: A drop operation onto the window has started.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType EnterNotify = int32(10)

Docs.summary: The pointer has entered the window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType EventLast = int32(37)

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType Expose = int32(2)

Docs.summary: All or part of the window has become visible and needs to be redrawn.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType FocusChange = int32(12)

Docs.summary: The keyboard focus has entered or left the window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType GrabBroken = int32(35)

Docs.summary: A pointer or keyboard grab was broken.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType KeyPress = int32(8)

Docs.summary: A key has been pressed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType KeyRelease = int32(9)

Docs.summary: A key has been released.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType LeaveNotify = int32(11)

Docs.summary: The pointer has left the window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType Map = int32(14)

Docs.summary: The window has been mapped.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType MotionNotify = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The pointer (usually a mouse) has moved.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType Nothing = int32(-1)

Docs.summary: A special code to indicate a null event.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType OwnerChange = int32(34)

Docs.summary: The owner of the selection has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType PropertyNotify = int32(16)

Docs.summary: A property on the window has been changed or deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType ProximityIn = int32(20)

Docs.summary: An input device has moved into contact with a sensing surface (e.g. a touchscreen or graphics tablet).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType ProximityOut = int32(21)

Docs.summary: An input device has moved out of contact with a sensing surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType Scroll = int32(31)

Docs.summary: The scroll wheel was turned.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType SelectionClear = int32(17)

Docs.summary: The application has lost ownership of a selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType SelectionNotify = int32(19)

Docs.summary: A selection has been received.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType SelectionRequest = int32(18)

Docs.summary: Another application has requested a selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType Setting = int32(33)

Docs.summary: A setting has been modified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType ThreeButtonPress = int32(6)

Docs.summary: A mouse button has been clicked 3 times in a short period of time. Note that each click also generates a ButtonPress event.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType TwoButtonPress = int32(5)

Docs.summary: A mouse button has been double-clicked (clicked twice within a short period of time). Note that each click also generates a ButtonPress event.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType Unmap = int32(15)

Docs.summary: The window has been unmapped.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType VisibilityNotify = int32(29)

Docs.summary: The window visibility status has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.EventType WindowState = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The state of a window has changed. See for the possible window states
